content: fingerless mittens are so practical and these ones are pretty too cables are fun - i made some pairs with a traditional cable - and several pairs with a fishtail cable both look great and i have included instructions for both there are 2 sizes ~ a teen/small adult lady for those with petite hands as well as an adult lady size worked flat and then seamed requirements dk yarn - less than 30g per pair 4mm needles a lovely gift idea **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
